name: css-reset-eg
description: A bare-bones CSS reset for modern web development. Created by Andy Bell. Edited by Emil Gerz. /n What's new? - body now has 100 dynamic height view instead.

scripts.build: uglifycss src/reset.css > dist/reset.min.css && cp src/reset.css dist/reset.css

author: Emil Gerz (https://t.me/emilgerz)
